basics.name: Harish Kesava Rao
basics.label: Data Infrastructure
basics.summary: Data Software Engineer with a focus on large scale data management on the cloud

work.name: Databricks
work.summary:
Deploying data pipelines and associated resources on AWS, Azure via Terraform (HCL) on Databricks workspaces.
Creating spark ingestion notebooks, tuning streaming and batch spark jobs and clusters on Azure and AWS.
Ingesting data from REST APIs and storing them on AWS S3 via standard Python frameworks.

work.name: Salesforce

work.name: Amazon Prime Video
work.summary: First Data Engineer for Prime Video Search. Designed and implemented a Data Lake for Prime Video Search using EMR, Spark, Scala, S3, Athena, Tableau, SageMaker.

work.name: Indeed
work.summary: Designed, standardized and automated DW/data pipelines using Postgres, Hive, Hadoop, Snowflake and Airflow.
